byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Matt Apuzzo in Washington; Joshua Jamerson, Rick Rojas, Michael Schwirtz and Michael Winerip in New York; and Susanne Craig and Lisa W. Foderaro in Malone. Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM and BENJAMIN MUELLER

abstract: Fugitive murderer Richard W Matt, who escaped from Clinton Correctional Facility in Dannemora, NY, three weeks earlier with fellow inmate David Sweat, is shot and killed by federal agent in wooded area of Malone, NY; Sweat remains at large.
lead_paragraph: Richard W. Matt, one of the convicted murderers who staged an elaborate escape from New York’s largest prison nearly three weeks ago, was fatally shot on Friday.

headline.main: Richard Matt, Escaped Prisoner in New York Manhunt, Is Fatally Shot
headline.print_headline: Escaped Killer Is Fatally Shot in New York
